Directions: In a Dutch oven or soup kettle, combine the broth, Worcestershire sauce, mustard, salt and pepper.  Stir in potatoes and carrots.  Bring to a boil.  Reduce heat; cover and simmer for 12 minutes or until carrots are crisp-tender.
Stir in the remaining ingredients.  Return to a boil.  Reduce heat; simmer, uncovered, for 5 minutes or until the vegetables are tender.
Ingredients: 2 cups frozen cut green beans, thawed
